name: Tyrant (goanywhereyoulike, William chen, stevenganyl, PochunChen, ScottXileChen)
name_original: Tyrant (goanywhereyoulike, William chen, stevenganyl, PochunChen, ScottXileChen)
description:
Tyrant is a 2D top-down tower defense shooter game created by a team of 8 programmers over 12 months.

Five types of towers: Normal Tower, Cannon Tower, Chain Tower, Lighting Tower, and Taunt Tower.

Three types of weapons: Cannon, Freeze Laser, and Flamethrower.

Three types of traps: Bear Trap,  Black Hole Trap, and Bomb.

The team consists of Steven Gan, William Chen, Pochun Chen, Scott Chen, Zhen Fang, Jiaxing Huang, and Kairus Lei from the Bachelor in Game Programming.
